subdisciplines.name: Bioinorganic chemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of inorganic chemical reactions and compounds in biological systems and models.

subdisciplines.name: Organometallic chemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of compounds that contain metal-carbon bonds.

subdisciplines.name: Cluster Chemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of compounds that contain metal-metal bonds in polyhedral systems.
